title: Gray's Girl
description: One hot rugby player, one dangerously sexy game…International rugby star Leighton Gray, Big L to his fans, is at the top of his game. Ruthless on the pitch, he’s living the dream. Maybe. Lonely, he’s looking for someone special to share his success with, but can’t stand the vapid women who flock around the team. When his best friend Damon tries to set up a blind date for his sister with one of their teammates, Gray steps in. He had a crush on Damon’s sister for years, so if anyone is going to take her out, it’s him.After finding her boyfriend balls deep in the blonde from down the hall, Frankie Cross is done with men. So she’s not impressed when her brother tells her that he’s set up a blind date with Leighton Gray, the scrawny waif he befriended years ago. But when she sees the giant Adonis standing in her doorway, she changes her mind. Little Leighton’s all grown up, and she’s having some very adult thoughts about the man he’s become…
author: Mina Carter
